Had a lot of fun working with my team at HomeSmart International and User10 in this project. https://lnkd.in/ghPtKVD
Cult Your Brand: A Direct Solution to the Customer Retention Problem
Director of Sales and Product Expert

● Responsible for all sales, implementations, customer success, product management and tier one technical support for BeckonCall, a clinical communication SaaS platform for physicians and their care teams. ● Grew registered accounts by 347%, registered users by 302%, and active accounts by 223%.● Implemented Pendo.io to capture product analytics including feature usage, average time in-app, and daily/weekly/monthly visit frequency.  Built in-app product tips, guides and release notes to better engage and onboard users. ● Implemented Drift as our online conversation-driven marketing and sales platform to automatically turn our website traﬃc into qualiﬁed sales meetings.  Built playbooks inside of Drift to drive traﬃc to sign-up for a sales demo or move them to a marketing drip campaign in Hubspot.  ● Performed and documented all customer development and user experience interviews.● Worked with CMO and CTO to determine product release schedule and roadmap.● Utilized Adobe After Eﬀects and Experience Design to wireframe and design UI and content for new BeckonCall website. ● Utilized Adobe Experience Design to wireframe and prototype new features for both web and mobile applications. ● Storyboarded and created all BeckonCall videos with Adobe After Eﬀects and Premiere Pro. Built and managed inbound and outbound sales landing pages with Unbounce.

●Responsible for opportunity management of small to large clients, and all aspects of business development. Personally accountable for information technology department all-time highs for weekly revenue ($46,425.48) and weekly net proﬁt ($32,150.26).●Only Information Technology Account Executive in Phoenix history to attain quarter contest of $130,000 of net proﬁt. ●Managed, identiﬁed and implemented workforce solutions for clients to help them achieve their key initiatives while reducing costs and risk.  Guided clients in the selection of employment type for upcoming projects by utilizing national, local, and client speciﬁc analytics to coordinate strategic hiring plans.  ●Gathered requirements on the use and execution of talent analytics from current and prospective clients to develop roadmap for additional internal predictive analytics products. ●Managed and developed our team of recruiters to ensure we were primed to deliver quality and sustainable solutions for our partners.  Co-developed a new 13 week information technology recruiter training manual and power point presentation. ●Developed and executed recruiting and delivery strategies which included developing and maintaining candidate pipelines, screening and training of our candidates, analysis of competitive market intelligence and analysis of branding strategies. ●Managed client recruitment projects ranging from 1-50+ requirements.

●  Oversaw membership recruitment and retention●  Created three year strategic plan entitled Vision of the Future ●  Coordinated all fundraising events including golf outing and awards banquet●  Co-Developed the Mississippi Valley Labor-Management Conference ●  Organized mock collective bargaining conference for local high school   students●  Partnered with United Way to increase student awareness of local union apprenticeship programs and skilled labor job opportunities

summary: Welcome!  My name is Cory and I'm currently the Director of Sales and product expert for an amazing healthcare company called BeckonCall.  I'm grateful to team up with our founder Dr. Jeffrey Becker on our mission to "To develop technology that simplifies all healthcare communication making it easier to practice medicine".BeckonCall is the app that replaces traditional live medical answering services and outdated communication technology like pagers.  With BeckonCall, physicians get no more off-duty interruptions, confusing messages or outrageous monthly bills.  BeckonCall is a web and mobile SaaS company located in sunny Phoenix, Arizona. I love connecting on LinkedIn about healthcare, technology or sales/marketing.
name: Cory Smith
title: Fixing healthcare communication @ BeckonCall
